content:
Council of Europe Secretary General Maria Peychinovich-Burich and Minister of Foreign Affairs, Education and Sports Liechtenstein Dominic Gasler, who is currently presiding on the Committee of Ministers of the Council of Europe on a working visit to the Kyiv region.

About thisinformsKyiv Regional Military Administration on Telegram.

In particular, foreign guests visited Bucha, who almost two years ago Ukrainian defenders liberated from the Russian occupation. At the Church of the St. Andrew the First Called Apostle, they honored the memory of the dead.

"Delegations demonstrated the consequences of hostilities that the city suffered and told about flashy violations of human rights, crimes and atrocities of the Russian military," the statement reads.

The parties also discussed the possibility of developing regional cooperation between the Kyiv region and the regions from the European Union member countries.

As reported by ArmyInform, the Secretary General of the Council of EuropeShe condemnedRussian rocket firing of Odessa.
title: Council Secretary General Maria Peychinovich-Burich visited Bucha
description: It is reported by the Kyiv Regional Military Administration on Telegram. In particular,...
author: Army Inform
